title: Episode 48 - "Pavement"
guest_stars: Colin Quinn, Pavement, Red Green, Goldie Hawn, Tommy Davidson

transcript.speaker: Choose a format
transcript.dialogue: Regular Table Indented Condensed

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (sips coffee) Guess who write tonight's show? (no response) Come on, guess!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (sighs) Who write it?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Me! I writed!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (invisos in) Greetings, everyone! I am Space Ghost, the most powerful being that have ever existed in the world of the universe! You know it. I know it. Moltar know it. Zorak know it. Tansut know it. Brak know it. Lokar know it. And those other people know it, too.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (speaking lines badly) It is a pleasure to work for someone (disgusted sigh) so good. (monitor shows text:)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Thank you, Moltar! Zorak?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (reading from script, sighs) I am a foul and degenerate creature, I will now play the music.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (invisos to desk) Zorak, that was very bad. That song you played; you go to prison.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Nuts to that action!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Stick with the script! (aims his power bands)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Awright, awright, I'm goin' to prison! Geez!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Moltar, get me the Beatles to replace Zorak.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: A-okay, chief. (quietly) Uh, Space Ghost, I, I'm not gonna be able to get the Beatles.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (quietly) Shhh, just get anybody, the audience won't know. They're all stupid. (monitor shows text:)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Hey, um, am I really going to prison?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (quietly) No, just go stand over there. (aloud) Moltar, get me a guest.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: You just told me to get the Beatles.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Moltar, you go to prison! (monitor shows text:)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (walking off) I'm confused by this whole deal...

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (standing off-stage with Moltar, holding script) Hey, welcome to prison...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Wait a second...

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: ... whattya in for?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Alright, everyone freeze. Don't move! Moltar, go back to your post. You are no longer a prisoner; that was a flashback.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Oh. (walks back to control room)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Alright, now we're back in the present, where I am a superhero talk show host, who is also a successful defense attorney, up against the fight of his life, but that hasn't been revealed yet, and Moltar is getting the guest, aaaaand... action!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (pause) Me? (monitor shows text:)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yeah.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (speaking lines badly) Master, master I offer unto thee, TV's Colin Quinn. (aside) Choke on it. (throws lever, sends Colin to studio monitor)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (as monitor lowers) TV's Colin Quinn! Prepare to bask in my greatness!

transcript.speaker: Colin Quinn
transcript.dialogue: Thanks, Space Ghost, it's a pleasure to be here.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: It is I who is administering the pleasure on this show.

transcript.speaker: Colin Quinn
transcript.dialogue: Is this posture too effeminate, is this okay...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: It really doesn't matter, because even though I've just made you a big star, you're no longer a guest on my show.

transcript.speaker: Colin Quinn
transcript.dialogue: (looks surprised) Okay.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Next guest, Moltar!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Oh, um, TV's Red Green. (throws lever, monitor cuts from Colin Colin to a quick shot of Boris Yeltsin dancing to Red)

transcript.speaker: Red Green
transcript.dialogue: You are, uh, you are, uh, you're a big fella.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: That's sweet!

transcript.speaker: Red Green
transcript.dialogue: You are a big, big fella.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: No! I'm a big big star! From this point on, no one talk to me!

transcript.speaker: Red Green
transcript.dialogue: (stares back silently, puzzled)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I would like my chocolate ice cream now.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (walks up to desk) (sighs) Here's your chocolate ice cream, my lord. (slams bowl down on desk)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Thank you, stupid idiot.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (muffles a scream) You're welcome. (walks off)

transcript.speaker: Red Green
transcript.dialogue: Gosh sakes...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Silence!!

transcript.speaker: Red Green
transcript.dialogue: (smiles) Alright.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (eats his ice cream)

transcript.speaker: Red Green
transcript.dialogue: I have a couple poems, would you like one?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (stops eating) Hold that thought, Red, it's time for me to read a poem now:When your life's a chain of troubles,And your dreams all broken bubbles,While your woes recur in doubles,Simply pause, and smile a while.(sobs, puts hand in front of his face) (sniff) I'm crying! Because I wanted you to see the full range (sniff) of my emotions!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I might stop by your lodge someday, Red!

transcript.speaker: Red Green
transcript.dialogue: Give us lots of warning, huh?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: And remember, (belches)

transcript.speaker: Red Green
transcript.dialogue: Yikes! Don't come on Mexican night, you'll regret it.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Thank you, Red. Now, go away from my monitor screen.

transcript.speaker: Red Green
transcript.dialogue: (holds up two videos he is plugging) That's it... (fades from monitor)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: The Beatles have arrived, my lege.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Colin, the Beatles are here!

transcript.speaker: Colin Quinn
transcript.dialogue: (back on monitor, chants/sings:) Space Ghost, Space Ghost, he's a ... (mumbles something) (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (laughs) Laughing at me with your big star mouth. Let us see how Zorak is doing in prison.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (stares back from the wings, silently)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Let us see how Zorak is doing in prison.

transcript.speaker: Colin Quinn
transcript.dialogue: Is that where you say somethin'?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Oh! Um... (scans script, then recites lines badly) Oh, I am in my cell. Oh, how I wished I would have played that song good, and that I was back in my keyboard.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Justice has been deserved. (sound of prison cell door closing) (back at his desk) Don't go away, we'll be right back with "Meet the Beatles". (pause) We're back, now's the time for a special segment of my show called "Space Ghost of the Cosmos Calling".

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (looking at his script book) Hey, wait a minute! This isn't in the script!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Hello, Timmy, is that you?

transcript.speaker: Timmy
transcript.dialogue: (actually Space Ghost talking in high voice with his hand over his face) Hello, hello! Hi Timmy, I, I mean, hi Space Ghost!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Hi, Timmy, Space Ghost of the Cosmos calling!

transcript.speaker: Timmy
transcript.dialogue: Oh, boy, I can't believe it! Is it really you?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You better believe it, Timmy!

transcript.speaker: Timmy
transcript.dialogue: Your show is the bestest...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Thanks, Timmy, keep pluggin' away!

transcript.speaker: Timmy
transcript.dialogue: But Space-

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: And keep on truckin'!

transcript.speaker: Timmy
transcript.dialogue: I've been sick, I've been so very sick!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh! Well, uh, come on, get better, why don't you?

transcript.speaker: Timmy
transcript.dialogue: Thank you, Space Ghost, I'm starting -

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: That's right, Timmy. And tell your doctor that Space Ghost of the Cosmos made a house call! (to camera) This is the best show ever.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Welcome back, stupid viewers. You'll watch anything! Go ahead, change the channel, you'll be back! And now, right here on our stage tonight, the Beatles!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (as they play) Aaaah! What?! (band keeps playing in background, Space Ghost shouts over their playing) Now, ladies and gentlemen, the delightful Goldie Hawn!

transcript.speaker: Goldie Hawn
transcript.dialogue: (monitor lowers with Goldie) Thank you very much, Space Ghost.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You look great, Goldie, how do you stay in such great shape?

transcript.speaker: Goldie Hawn
transcript.dialogue: Uh, Tony ????

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What?

transcript.speaker: Goldie Hawn
transcript.dialogue: He, um...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What?

transcript.speaker: Goldie Hawn
transcript.dialogue: He is a very special...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (sticks head in corner of screen, "sings":) Space Ghost, living the high life!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: That was jolly good! Jolly good!

transcript.speaker: Steve West
transcript.dialogue: Time to go! Bye bye.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Now it appears that it's time for our next guest to appear. Moltar, send out my next guest. I will be back shortly, so don't worry about sending the guest out now, just do it now. That way the guest will be ready when my questioning begins upon my return.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: As you wish, O mighty mighty one. (throws lever, sends Tommy to studio monitor) (to himself) This just bites, is all.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What did you say?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: I said, This. Just. Bites. Is all.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What page are you on?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: This is the worst show! You know it, I know it, Zorak know it...

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (reading script) I, Zorak, have decided to dig a tunnel to escape...

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Shut up, Zorak!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: ... prison.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: On we go! Greet me, Tommy Davidson!

transcript.speaker: Tommy Davidson
transcript.dialogue: (impersonating Sammy Davis Jr., sings) Spa-a-ace Ghost!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (laughs and laughs)

transcript.speaker: Tommy Davidson
transcript.dialogue: (impersonating Al Jarreau, sings) Space Ghost, ???? out in the u-u-universe.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (finishes laughing) Woo, lord.

transcript.speaker: Tommy Davidson
transcript.dialogue: OK, I hear ya.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What did I just say?

transcript.speaker: Tommy Davidson
transcript.dialogue: Woo, lord!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You are an attentive listener! I like the shape of your head!

transcript.speaker: Tommy Davidson
transcript.dialogue: (bats his eyelashes) I like you.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I like you too, Dan.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (clears his throat) This tunnel that I am digging out of the prison is much longer and much more difficult than I had anticipated.

transcript.speaker: Great Gazoo
transcript.dialogue: (zaps in) I am here to help you in your time of trouble.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Ladies and gentlemen, the Great Gazoo!

transcript.speaker: Great Gazoo
transcript.dialogue: Toodle-loo, dum dums! (zaps out)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: The Great Gazoo, ladies and gentlemen.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Hey, I thought he was supposed to help me with my tunnel!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: No, that was a cameo. Hel-looo!

transcript.speaker: Tommy Davidson
transcript.dialogue: (impersonating Al Jarreau, sings) Zo-rak! We-e-e are here wai-ting, me-e-e and Space Ghost!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (sounding like Nelson Eddy, sings) That's right, Tommy! We-e-e are here wai-ting, me-e-e and Tommy!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Hey, Space Ghost, about this finale. How you gonna do all this stuff with Jupiter, and... who's Fidor?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, where are you gonna get all the money for that?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: I don't think it's feasible.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Just read your line.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (reads script) Space Ghost, Fidor is trying to eat Jupiter.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Someone must stop him.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Sounds like Fidor needs to go out for a walk, Space Ghost style! (flies off)

transcript.speaker: Tommy Davidson
transcript.dialogue: Good one.

transcript.speaker: (Action insert
transcript.dialogue: Space Ghost vs. Fidor, with dramatic background music)

transcript.speaker: Fidor
transcript.dialogue: (eating Jupiter, which looks amazingly like the Ghost Planet's moon; Space Ghost "flies in" and hits him) Ruff! Space Ghost! Ruff!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Looks like your bark is worse than your bite, Fidor! (punches Fidor several more times) (standing on top of "Jupiter", as Fidor eats out of his dog dish) Once again, I have saved the universe!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (bounds back to desk) (exhales) All evil everywhere is vanquished, just like I write it to happen.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (reading script) Hail the returing hero.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yes, yes. And also, Moltar, from this point on, I write all the world shows, because everyone watching turns out to like them so much. Tommy Davidson, you may now return safely to your planet.

transcript.speaker: Tommy Davidson
transcript.dialogue: Thanks for having me. (fades from monitor)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Zorak, I am freeing you from prison at this very moment.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Oh, how I...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: There! All is well, all over the place. You may now be left with the Beatles.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: This show's so good, I'm thinking about not even airing it.
